item.description:
The monthly meetings are primarily non-mandatory networking events. Although we talk business at them for half an hour and occasionally play evidence clips, these events are for discussion, event/investigation planning, asking questions, tell your own stories, etc. They're so we can all have a little no-pressure time as a group, and it helps us all by reminding each other that this stuff might be more than TV and book fodder, but real events happening to real individuals.
The private back room also has a projector on the ceiling that can be used for evidence clips.

As always, Asia has a decent buffet going til 8:00 - $12 per person - or choose something from their most excellent menu.

Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: We usually sit at a table in the back private room.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group July Meetup
